remarks: Condition implying a lattice line.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2012.)
statement:
llnset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
llnset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
llnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnset.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llni $p |- ( ( ( K e. D /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ P C X ) -> X e. N ) $.
